Text: Wow, another one with NO SAMPLE.  It can't take any longer to export a 30-60sec sample than to do all those screens.
Good idea-see if you can handle it for us.
shut yer trap, michael! TVT NEVER gives descriptions, samples nor IMDB links.  Search the net yerself.

You know that it's a first run through the mill brother, no need to get antsy. The good loot is on its way...many thanks to those that make this fascist world a little bit freer...one upload at a time. GOD SPEED!!!
